faqs.q: How many calories are in a half banana?
faqs.a: Approximately 53 kcal for half a medium banana.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a half banana?
faqs.a: About 13.5g carbs, including 1.6g fiber and 7.2g sugars.

faqs.q: Does banana size affect calories in a half?
faqs.a: Yes; small half ≈36 kcal, large half ≈67 kcal.
No, only 0.7g protein per half banana; they're carb-rich.

faqs.q: How does ripeness change calories in a banana?
faqs.a: Riper bananas have more sugars but similar total calories; starch converts to sugars.
